attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year, thousands of immigrants flood the UK, many illigal and this is forcing the British public to leave their country and set up a life somewhere eles. in 2007, over 300,000 brits left. If this influx of immigrannts continues, there will not be a UK left. Mr Prime Minister, you seriously need to do somthing about this....Call me racist if you want, but this is what the british public want.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
